mdRecord.dcterms:title: All Saints Church, interior

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: In 1904, All Saints became a mission and was named a parish in 1914. Thinking about an actual church building (at this early stage of research) probably started in 1916. The church has been called "one of the most satisfying works of one of America's more important architects." The first service in the new church was on August 8, 1920. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/All_Saints_Church_%28Peterborough,_New_Hampshire%29 [work]
